Game information:  


With the return to the universe of Borderlands! Palite of all trunks and
grab all that is bad, in a brand new adventure that literally sends you
into space - on the surface of the satellite of the planet Pandora.
Events Borderlands: The Pre-Sequel! occurs between Borderlands and
Borderlands 2. Find out more about the past Handsome Jack, the main
villain Borderlands 2, and perhaps understand how he came to such a
life. Experiment with low gravity with ecstasy shoot enemies from a
new ice and laser weapons, drive on the lunar landscape on THE NEW
CAR and arrange a complete mess!



Game Features:  


Learn how to begin the path of the main villain Borderlands,
and become an eyewitness to his crimes.

Fight and navigate in low gravity. Palite of the latest ice
and laser weapons. Show cosmic bandits, who is in charge.

Try out four new character classes. You are greeted bully
Wilhelm zakonnitsa Niche, gladiator Athena and specially
modified for combat robot prototype Fragus. Welcome to
the team Handsome Jack!
